author: saumyaphor4252
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42139

- The PR updates the 2022, 2023 and 2024 MC GTs with the RPC geometry fix for the issue in the RPC chambers requested in [this CMS Talk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/fix-for-rpc-geometry-for-run3-data-and-mc/25678) [1]. 

[1] https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/fix-for-rpc-geometry-for-run3-data-and-mc/25678

**GT Differences**:
 - **Phase1 2022 design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2022_design_v2/130X_mcRun3_2022_design_v3

- **Phase1 2022 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v3/130X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_v4

- **Phase1 2022 realistic postEE**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_postEE_v3/130X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_postEE_v4

- **Phase1 2022 cosmics**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2022cosmics_realistic_deco_v3/130X_mcRun3_2022cosmics_realistic_deco_v4

- **Phase1 2022 cosmics design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2022cosmics_design_deco_v2/130X_mcRun3_2022cosmics_design_deco_v3

- **Phase1 2022 realistic hi**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_HI_v6/130X_mcRun3_2022_realistic_HI_v7

- **Phase1 2023 design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023_design_v7/130X_mcRun3_2023_design_v8

- **Phase1 2023 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v9/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v10

- **Phase1 2023 cosmics**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_realistic_deco_v8/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_realistic_deco_v9

- **Phase1 2023 cosmics design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_design_deco_v7/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_design_deco_v8

- **Phase1 2023 realistic hi**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_HI_v14/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_HI_v15

- **Phase1 2024 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v7/130X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v8

#### PR validation:
GTs tested locally with `runTheMatrix.py -l 12034.0,11634.0,7.23,7.24,159.0,159.1,12434.0,12834.0  -j 8 --ibeos` and `runTheMatrix.py -l 13734.0 --what upgrade`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42139
title: [13_0_X] Update RPC geometry fix in 2022, 2023 and 2024 MC GTs
